name: bluebird
description: Full featured Promises/A+ implementation with exceptionally good performance

scripts.prepublish: npm run generate-browser-core && npm run generate-browser-full
scripts.generate-browser-core: node tools/build.js --features=core --no-debug --release --zalgo --browser --minify && mv js/browser/bluebird.js js/browser/bluebird.core.js && mv js/browser/bluebird.min.js js/browser/bluebird.core.min.js
